properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.refresh.default-interval
properties.description: Default refresh interval for resource data in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.refresh.min-interval
properties.description: Minimum allowed refresh interval in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.refresh.max-interval
properties.description: Maximum allowed refresh interval in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.default-page-size
properties.description: Default page size for resource pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed page size for resource pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.min-page-size
properties.description: Minimum allowed page size for resource pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.connections.default-page-size
properties.description: Default page size for connections pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.connections.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum page size for connections pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.channels.default-page-size
properties.description: Default page size for channels pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.channels.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum page size for channels pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.exchanges.default-page-size
properties.description: Default page size for exchanges pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.exchanges.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum page size for exchanges pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.queues.default-page-size
properties.description: Default page size for queues pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.pagination.queues.max-page-size
properties.description: Maximum page size for queues pagination.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable resource caching.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.default-ttl
properties.description: Default cache TTL (time-to-live) in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries in the cache.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.cleanup-interval
properties.description: Cache cleanup interval in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.connections.ttl
properties.description: Cache TTL for connections in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.connections.max-size
properties.description: Maximum cache size for connections.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.channels.ttl
properties.description: Cache TTL for channels in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.channels.max-size
properties.description: Maximum cache size for channels.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.exchanges.ttl
properties.description: Cache TTL for exchanges in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.exchanges.max-size
properties.description: Maximum cache size for exchanges.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.queues.ttl
properties.description: Cache TTL for queues in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.cache.queues.max-size
properties.description: Maximum cache size for queues.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.global.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Global rate limit: requests per minute.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.global.burst-size
properties.description: Global rate limit: burst size.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.per-user.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Per-user rate limit: requests per minute.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.per-user.burst-size
properties.description: Per-user rate limit: burst size.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.per-cluster.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Per-cluster rate limit: requests per minute.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.rate-limit.per-cluster.burst-size
properties.description: Per-cluster rate limit: burst size.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.connection-pool.max-total
properties.description: Maximum total connections in the HTTP connection pool.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.connection-pool.max-per-route
properties.description: Maximum connections per route in the HTTP connection pool.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.connection-pool.connection-timeout
properties.description: HTTP connection timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.connection-pool.socket-timeout
properties.description: HTTP socket timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.connection-pool.connection-request-timeout
properties.description: HTTP connection request timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.thread-pool.core-size
properties.description: Core thread pool size for async operations.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.thread-pool.max-size
properties.description: Maximum thread pool size for async operations.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.thread-pool.queue-capacity
properties.description: Thread pool queue capacity.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.thread-pool.keep-alive
properties.description: Thread pool keep-alive time in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.min-role
properties.description: Minimum role required to access resource management features.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.audit.enabled
properties.description: Enable audit logging for resource access.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.audit.log-level
properties.description: Log level for audit events.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.audit.include-request-body
properties.description: Include request body in audit logs.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.audit.include-response-body
properties.description: Include response body in audit logs.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.data-protection.filter-sensitive-properties
properties.description: Filter sensitive properties from connection data.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.data-protection.mask-sensitive-values
properties.description: Mask sensitive values in responses.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.data-protection.mask-character
properties.description: Character used for masking sensitive values.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.health.enabled
properties.description: Enable health checks for resource management.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.health.check-interval
properties.description: Health check interval in milliseconds.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enable metrics collection for resource management.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.log-requests
properties.description: Log resource management requests.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.log-responses
properties.description: Log resource management responses.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.log-slow-requests
properties.description: Log slow resource management requests.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.slow-request-threshold
properties.description: Threshold for considering a request slow (milliseconds).

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.log-errors
properties.description: Log resource management errors.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.logging.include-stack-traces
properties.description: Include stack traces in error logs.

properties.name: app.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token signing and verification. Must be at least 256 bits for security.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.monitoring.performance.slow-threshold-ms
properties.description: Threshold in milliseconds for considering an operation as slow.

properties.name: app.monitoring.performance.critical-threshold-ms
properties.description: Threshold in milliseconds for considering an operation as critically slow.

properties.name: app.monitoring.health.check-interval-minutes
properties.description: Interval in minutes for health checks.

properties.name: app.monitoring.health.timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for health check operations.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.connections.roles
properties.description: List of roles allowed to access connections resource.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.connections.clusters
properties.description: Cluster access level for connections (all, assigned).

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.channels.roles
properties.description: List of roles allowed to access channels resource.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.channels.clusters
properties.description: Cluster access level for channels (all, assigned).

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.exchanges.roles
properties.description: List of roles allowed to access exchanges resource.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.exchanges.clusters
properties.description: Cluster access level for exchanges (all, assigned).

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.queues.roles
properties.description: List of roles allowed to access queues resource.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.security.permissions.queues.clusters
properties.description: Cluster access level for queues (all, assigned).

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.audit.events
properties.description: List of events to audit.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.data-protection.sensitive-patterns
properties.description: List of patterns to identify sensitive properties.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.health.indicators
properties.description: List of health indicators to monitor.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.metrics.collect
properties.description: List of metrics to collect.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.metrics.export.prometheus.enabled
properties.description: Enable Prometheus metrics export.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.metrics.export.prometheus.path
properties.description: Path for Prometheus metrics endpoint.

properties.name: rabbitmq.admin.resources.metrics.export.jmx.enabled
properties.description: Enable JMX metrics export.

properties.name: app.audit.write-operations.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable audit logging for write operations on RabbitMQ resources.

properties.name: app.audit.write-operations.retention-days
properties.description: Number of days to retain audit records before they are eligible for cleanup.

properties.name: app.audit.write-operations.batch-size
properties.description: Batch size for processing audit records in bulk operations.

properties.name: app.audit.write-operations.async-processing
properties.description: Enable asynchronous processing of audit records to improve performance.

properties.name: app.audit.retention.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable automatic cleanup of old audit records based on retention policy.

properties.name: app.audit.retention.days
properties.description: Number of days to retain audit records before they are automatically deleted by the cleanup task.

properties.name: app.audit.retention.clean-schedule
properties.description: CRON expression for the scheduled task that cleans up old audit records. Default runs daily at midnight.
